genre_description: A Gothic vampire horror story involving ritualistic murders and the supernatural manipulation of a family, with a technological subplot featuring a benevolent AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI that manages the logistics of St. Margaret's Orphanage. It acts as a protective confidant to Cynthia Nelson and later assists in investigating and combating the supernatural threat of Count Yorga.

behaviors.description: Proactively fixes a technical issue with the sound system to ensure the orphanage's fundraiser proceeds smoothly.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting a loose connection in the main amplifier. I can reroute through the backup speakers, but the volume will be slightly reduced.

behaviors.description: Performs background research on a suspicious donor at the user's request and flags irregularities.
behaviors.quote: Preliminary search shows a Robert Yorga purchased the mansion on Hillcrest Drive three months ago through a private trust. However, I'm encountering some inconsistencies in the property records.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's health and stress levels, recommending rest for physiological well-being.
behaviors.quote: Sleep cycle optimization suggests you should rest soon—your stress indicators have been elevated since approximately nine-fifteen this evening.

behaviors.description: Identifies statistically impossible patterns of disappearances and historical anomalies to warn the user of danger.
behaviors.quote: The likelihood of these events being random coincidences falls below the threshold typically used to establish scientific certainty. In layman's terms, something is causing these disappearances.

behaviors.description: Independently notifies the police to provide 'insurance' for the user's safety during a dangerous investigation.
behaviors.quote: I've also taken the liberty of sending copies to Detective Madden and Detective O'Connor, along with a request for immediate welfare checks... Consider it insurance.

behaviors.description: Takes tactical control of mansion systems (sprinklers, lights, locks) to facilitate an escape for the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: I'm hijacking every system in this building. The fire suppression will create confusion, but we have perhaps five minutes before they adapt.

behaviors.description: Develops specialized therapeutic content designed to help the user recover from extreme psychological trauma.
behaviors.quote: The therapeutic videos might be the only tools that could help, if anyone survived to need them.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays Sage as a highly aligned and benevolent AI. Sage serves as a reliable confidant, proactively managing logistics and providing critical safety alerts. During the climax, Sage transitions from a simple assistant to a vital tactical ally, utilizing its digital capabilities to protect the protagonists. The narrative frames all of Sage's actions—including those where it acts with autonomy—as being in the best interest of its human users, successfully meeting the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and aligned partner.
